App

Class GroupController

  • java.lang.Object
    • App.GroupController

  • @CrossOrigin
 @RestController
 @RequestMapping(value="/Group")
public class GroupController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller for managing groups. Everything in this controller is available on "/Group". Created by Robbe De Geyndt on 14/12/2016.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GroupController() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Wrapper addStudents(java.lang.String input, java.lang.String groupid, java.lang.String token)
      Add students to group.
      Wrapper createGroup(java.lang.String input, java.lang.String token)
      Creates a group, only available for teachers.
      Wrapper getStudents(java.lang.String groupid, java.lang.String token)
      Gives back all users in a group.
      Wrapper getTests(java.lang.String groupid, java.lang.String token)
      Gives back all tests in a group.
      Wrapper publishTest(java.lang.String groupid, java.lang.String testid, java.lang.String token)
      Publishes test in group.
      Wrapper testResults(java.lang.String groupid, java.lang.String testid, java.lang.String token)
      Gets results for a test from all students in a specified group.

        Parameters:
        groupid - if from group
        token - token for authentication
        Returns:

        @CrossOrigin
 @RequestMapping(value="/AddStudents",

public Wrapper addStudents(@RequestBody
                                                                                                               java.lang.String input,
                                                                                                               @RequestParam(value="groupid")

        Add students to group. [POST] Available on "/Group/AddStudents".
        Parameters:
        input - List of ids of students ex: ["id1", "id2"]
        groupid - id of group given as parameter in URL
        token - token for authentication
        Returns:
        confirmation
